cause.description:
Our mission is to help save the homes of good hard working people who may loose their homes due to the new tax increase. We are trying to collect donations to help these families to pay. All the money will go to help these struggling families we are 100% non-profit. If you have anything you can spare to help this cause it would be greatly appreciated and thank you.
1. Good people shouldn't have to loose their homes because of tax increases
cause.mission: Help those who can't afford the new tax raise and may loose their homes
cause.name: S.O.H.
